title: Why people hate Mao?
body:
Is it his absurd base dmg? Nah
His stupid tankiness with passive? Nah
Maybe his absolutelty stupid  flash W no counterplay 360 no scope jimmynothumbs play? Gee dunno guys.

replies.body: it's too high in fat and cholesterol
You forgot he is invulnerable during his dash, which also destroys any projectiles or spells targeting him.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8PyRJt4u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-31T02:15:19.768+0000)
>
> You forgot he is invulnerable during his dash, which also destroys any projectiles or spells targeting him.

Untargetable I think, so it doesn't destroy things coming his way but dodged (by having all targetting methods from lock ons, to AoE, to skillshots, to autolocks, to completely ignore him and pretend he doesn't exist). But hey.
